name: Elizabeth (Tired.Jacs.Art)
description:
A game set a few years after Neviem, though you need no prior knowledge to enjoy this game.

You play as a blacksmith's apprentice sent to check on a friend of your mentor after having been uncharacteristically silent for a while.

Created as an assignment for UCF's DIG 3024: Digital Cultures and Narratives.

Music Attribution:

Magic Scout Cottages by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4672-magic-scout-cottages
